channel.title: Need someone REALLY GOOD with servers!
channel.description:
Ok, my server works perfectly when someone connects with Moparscape Client. So, here's the problem. When I download a client which is open source and connect to my server through localhost, it works fine. Although when I connect through the server IP (gazscape.no-ip.biz) it just disconnects everyone and gives an error. This is the error:
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8199/errorcf8.png[/img]
Anyone have any idea on how do fix this?
-Gaz

item.title: Need someone REALLY GOOD with servers!
item.dc:creator: @gazer11 gazer11
item.description:
@gazer11 wrote:

I want other people to use the client to connect to the server aswell…

-Gaz

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone REALLY GOOD with servers!

item.title: Need someone REALLY GOOD with servers!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Just don’t connect through Your IP you can still connect through the Local Host And still be with the same people on your server.

Read full topic
